Name: TCSTRIKERS4
About the game: this Is the Biggest News Title Of 2021. A Cute Bullet-hell Shooter Is Now Available. It features cool and futuristic visuals and active gameplay. There's no need to be afraid of the bullet screen. I aimed for a game balance that is easy for beginners and deeply enjoyable for advanced players. joshua, You've Changed Your Phone? yeah Because Budget's Phones Are Crap. yeah, I Know. That Company Sucks. hi Guys! hi, What Are You Up to? Do you know anything about that big building on the edge of town? Yes, I saw it but I'm afraid I don't know anything about it. I see. Some say it's creepy. It's a troublesome thing. Do you want me to go and investigate? You? Are you sure? Could you waive the advertising costs permanently instead? Yeah, fine. Thank you, Sir. This may look like a sea lion, but this is our Director. Joshua, get out of here! Z:Shot(Decide) X:PowerShot,CrushCancel(Cancel) Shift:Laser C:Accel(Increase FPS) ESC:Pause During the PowerShot, the laser eliminates bullets. Skip conversation:Hold down shot and laser alt+enter:fullscreen CrushCancel 1.If you press the Power Shot button within a certain amount of time after being hit, the hit will be canceled. 2.Consumes 5 times as much power as the remaining time. 3.Remaining time - You will be given 60 bullets at first. - The remaining time will decrease with each hit. - It will recover when you clear the stage.;
